name: Lever Recruiting
description: Integrate with Lever Recruiting to list, create, list and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Opportunities
tools.description: List opportunities (candidates in pipeline) from Lever. Filter by stage, posting, or archive status.

tools.name: Create Opportunity
tools.description: Create a new opportunity (candidate) in Lever. Provide candidate name, contact info, and optionally associate with a posting.

tools.name: List Postings
tools.description: List job postings from Lever. Returns posting titles, teams, locations, and states.

tools.name: Get Candidate
tools.description: Get detailed information about a candidate (opportunity) in Lever by their opportunity ID.

tools.name: Add Note
tools.description: Add a note to a candidate opportunity in Lever. Notes are visible to the hiring team.
